    About

    I’m Davide Gessa (aka dak[k]*), a software developer, computer scientist and sailor from Sardinia, Italy.

    Have fun with my github at github.com/dakk.

    • 2023 - Qlasskit - a python-to-quantum compiler (Software)
    • 2016 - Contractvm: decentralized applications on Bitcoin (White paper)
    • 2016 - A general-purpose decentralized system based on the Bitcoin block-chain (Master degree thesis)
